description: The largest labor union in the country has threatened to organize a nationwide strike unless we raise the minimum wage. We think it's a bluff, but refusal to meet their demands may still hamper our approval. The demands are quite significant and could strain our economy. How should we respond to this matter?

options.description: Raise the wages, workers deserve it.
These demands are unreasonable and will harm our economic stability.
Let's propose a modest increase and negotiate with the union.

title: Labor Union's Demand for Higher Minimum Wage
